##### FILE: nginx-with-emptyDir.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pi-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pi-proxy
  name: pi-proxy
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pi-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: pi-proxy
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.17-alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /data/nginx/cache
          name: cache-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: pi-proxy-configmap
        name: config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: cache-volume

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/pi-proxy
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/pi-proxy failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/pi-proxy failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/pi-proxy failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/pi-proxy failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/pi-proxy failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/pi-proxy failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/pi-proxy failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

          name: http

          name: config
          readOnly: true

        name: config

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pi-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pi-proxy
  name: pi-proxy
  namespace: default

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pi-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"

          name: cache-volume

          name: pi-proxy-configmap
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /volumes/nginx/cache
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: cache-volume

##### FILE: nginx-with-probe.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx-with-probe:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-with-probe
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      httpGet:
        path: /
        port: 80
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 5
      successThreshold: 1
      timeoutSeconds: 1
    name: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80

---

kind: Pod

  namespace: ns-two

  containers:

    name: test-container
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/test
      name: test-volume
  volumes:
  - name: test-volume
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: test-pvc

##### FILE: nginx-with-rollingUpdate.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/env-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: env-test
  name: env-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: env-test
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: env-test
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.17
        name: nginx

---
